item.caption: Idle time
item.comment: It is amount of time, after which user's status changes to idle.

item.caption: Delete time
item.comment: It is amount of time, after which user's status changes to delete. And user is disconnected from the chat.

item.caption: Max number of rooms
item.comment: The maximum number of rooms which can be created in the chat.

item.caption: Is chat left
item.comment: It is the position of chat area relatively to users list.

item.caption: Print date and time in every message
Multiple Active Rooms Mode
item.comment: Enable the abblity to view users in different rooms.

item.caption: Use IM
item.comment: Allow users to call IM from the chat or not.

item.caption: User types
item.comment: Use user types in the chat. Users of different types have different capabilities.

item.caption: Default user type
item.comment: The type which will be granted to newly joined user.

item.caption: Use sounds
item.comment: Use sound on different chat events(login, change room, start/stop video transfer and etc)

item.caption: Use "Who is watching" option
item.comment: Allows users to know who is watching/listening one's broadcasting
